titleStmt.title: Humors antique faces Drawne in proportion to his seuerall antique iestures.
titleStmt.author: Rowlands, Samuel, 1570?-1630?

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted [by Edward Allde] for Henry Rockett, and are to bee solde at the long Shop vnder S. Mildreds Church in the Poultrie,

notesStmt.note: Identified as STC 17133 on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of a photostat of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
